description.zh-cn: 蜀汉的最后一位皇帝，刘备之子。
description.en: The last emperor of the state of Shu Han, son of Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉开国皇帝，刘禅之父。
description.en: Founding emperor of Shu Han, father of Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的妾室，刘禅的生母。
description.en: A concubine of Liu Bei and the biological mother of Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期由刘备建立的政权。
description.en: A state founded by Liu Bei during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉将领，曾在长坂坡保护刘禅。
description.en: A general of Shu Han who protected Liu Shan at Changban.

description.zh-cn: 孙权的妹妹，刘备的夫人，曾试图将刘禅带往东吴。
description.en: Sister of Sun Quan and wife of Liu Bei, who attempted to take Liu Shan to Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉丞相，受刘备托孤辅佐刘禅。
description.en: Chancellor of Shu Han, who served as regent for Liu Shan on Liu Bei's request.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉宦官，深得刘禅宠信。
description.en: A eunuch of Shu Han who was deeply trusted and favored by Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉后期大将军。
description.en: A prominent general in the late Shu Han period.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏将领，率军灭亡蜀汉。
description.en: A general of Cao Wei who led the conquest of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉大臣，劝说刘禅投降。
description.en: An official of Shu Han who persuaded Liu Shan to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，接受了刘禅的投降。
description.en: One of the Three Kingdoms, which accepted Liu Shan's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏末期权臣，西晋的奠基者。
description.en: A powerful regent in the late Cao Wei period and the founder of the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 取代曹魏的统一王朝。
description.en: The dynasty that succeeded Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 汉赵开国皇帝，追谥刘禅为孝怀皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of Han-Zhao who posthumously honored Liu Shan as Emperor Xiaohuai.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉将领，刘禅的岳父。
description.en: A general of Shu Han and the father-in-law of Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅的第一位皇后，张飞长女。
description.en: Liu Shan's first empress, the elder daughter of Zhang Fei.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅的第二位皇后，张飞次女。
description.en: Liu Shan's second empress, the younger daughter of Zhang Fei.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅的太子，在钟会之乱中丧生。
description.en: Crown Prince of Liu Shan, killed during Zhong Hui's Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉灭亡后，曹魏将领钟会在成都发动的叛乱。
description.en: A rebellion launched by Cao Wei general Zhong Hui in Chengdu after the fall of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅之子，在蜀汉亡国当日自杀。
description.en: Son of Liu Shan, who committed suicide on the day Shu Han fell.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅第六子，继承安乐公爵位。
description.en: The sixth son of Liu Shan, who inherited the title of Duke of Anle.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏与西晋的都城，刘禅投降后居住于此。
description.en: The capital of Cao Wei and Western Jin, where Liu Shan lived after his surrender.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅是刘备之子。
description.en: Liu Shan is the son of Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅由刘备的妾室甘夫人所生。
description.en: Liu Shan was born to Lady Gan, a concubine of Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅是蜀汉的第二位也是最后一位皇帝，在位41年。
description.en: Liu Shan was the second and last emperor of Shu Han, reigning for 41 years.

description.zh-cn: 在长坂坡保护了刘禅母子，使其幸免于难。
description.en: Protected Liu Shan and his mother at the Battle of Changban, ensuring their survival.

description.zh-cn: 奉诸葛亮之命，阻止孙夫人将刘禅带往东吴，成功夺回刘禅。
description.en: Following Zhuge Liang's order, intercepted Lady Sun and prevented her from taking Liu Shan to Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 受刘备托孤，在刘禅继位初期作为丞相辅佐并处理所有军政大事。
description.en: Entrusted by Liu Bei, he served as Chancellor and regent for Liu Shan, handling all state affairs in the early years of his reign.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅宠信宦官黄皓，听信其言不设防备，导致蜀汉对曹魏的入侵毫无准备。
description.en: Liu Shan favored and trusted the eunuch Huang Hao, whose advice left Shu Han unprepared for the invasion from Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 姜维因畏惧黄皓的权势，为求自保而率兵在外屯垦。
description.en: Jiang Wei feared Huang Hao's power and led his troops to garrison at Tazhong to protect himself.

description.zh-cn: 率领魏军偷渡阴平，兵临成都，直接导致了蜀汉的灭亡。
description.en: Led the Wei army on a surprise march via Yinping to the capital Chengdu, which directly led to the fall of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 在邓艾兵临城下时，劝说刘禅放弃抵抗，向曹魏投降。
description.en: When Deng Ai's army approached the capital, he persuaded Liu Shan to give up resistance and surrender to Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 投降曹魏后，刘禅被迁往洛阳，在曹魏实际掌权者司马昭的控制下生活。
description.en: After surrendering to Cao Wei, Liu Shan was relocated to Luoyang and lived under the control of Sima Zhao, the de facto ruler of Wei.

description.zh-cn: 建立汉赵政权后，追谥刘禅为“孝怀皇帝”，提升了刘禅的历史声誉。
description.en: After founding the Han-Zhao state, Liu Yuan posthumously honored Liu Shan with the title 'Emperor Xiaohuai', enhancing his historical reputation.

description.zh-cn: 刘璇在钟会之乱中被杀害。
description.en: Liu Xuan was killed during Zhong Hui's Rebellion.
